message.content:
cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.RO, cs.SY, cs.SE 

The paper discusses the core concept of tasks in artificial intelligence and the need for a task theory to enable more rigorous evaluation and comparison of AI systems. This topic falls under the scope of several arXiv CS sub-categories, including cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.RO (Robotics), cs.SY (Systems and Control), and cs.SE (Software Engineering). However, given the focus on AI and machine learning, cs.AI and cs.LG are the most likely categories, followed by cs.RO and cs.SY for their relevance to robotics and control systems, and cs.SE for the software engineering aspect of building and evaluating AI systems.
